tool_description: Validates chronological consistency and logic of invoice dates, including issue date, due date, service dates, and payment terms.

invoice_date.description: Invoice issue date in ISO 8601 format

due_date.description: Payment due date in ISO 8601 format

service_start_date.description: Service period start date in ISO 8601 format

service_end_date.description: Service period end date in ISO 8601 format

payment_terms.description: Payment terms in days (e.g., 30 for Net 30)

allow_future_dates.description: Whether to allow future invoice dates

error_messages: Invalid date format: All dates must be in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD).
Future invoice date not allowed: Invoice date cannot be in the future unless explicitly allowed.
Due date before invoice date: Due date must be after invoice date.
Service dates invalid: Service end date must be after service start date.
Payment terms out of range: Payment terms must be between 0 and 365 days.
Chronological inconsistency: Date sequence violates logical business rules.
usage: Provide invoice date and optionally other dates. Set payment terms and future date policy. Tool validates chronological consistency and business logic.

dates_valid.description: Whether all date logic is valid

expected_due_date.description: Calculated due date based on invoice date and payment terms

days_to_due.description: Days between invoice date and due date

service_period_days.description: Length of service period in days if applicable

date_issues.description: List of date validation issues found
